name: Danceferatu
description:
Each night Danceferatu the vampire needs to perform his pre-feeding dance ritual!

This was created for the Cleveland Global Game  2016. The theme was ritual.  Unfortunately we didn't get a chance to put an ending in.

Idea: For some reason prior to the game jam I was obsessed with the vampire Nosferatu. During the brainstorming someone mentioned disco. I don't know what came over me but my first though was"Vampire... Ritual... Dance... DANCEFERATU!"

The team was:

Jarryd Huntley
Jeff Ziegener
Steph Frank
Ian Faleer
